articles.title: About this site
articles.description: This website displays the average full-time salary of employees by department
articles.contents:
One of my goals is to determine which department provides the greatest average salary in the city.
One of the biggest challenges I experienced throughout this project is to display salaries from greatest to least.
Here is the link to the repository for this graph: https://github.com/EmmanB1/RFinalProject

articles.title: Average Salary Per Department in Chicago
articles.description: This website displays the average department salaries in Chicago as of 2021 from greatest to least.

articles.title: Source for Data
articles.description: The source of the database that I used to create this graph.
articles.contents:
